imdb.plot outline: A 5 episode series that focuses on Chinese nationals of vastly different walks of life, occupations and backgrounds, all of whom have found a happy new foothold in Africa. We learn what enterprises they are involved with in Africa, hear what they love about their new homes, but also what challenges they've had to overcome while settling on a new continent.
imdb.title: Beautiful Africa: My Second Home
akas: Beautiful Africa: My Second Home (South Africa)
plot: A 5 episode series that focuses on Chinese nationals of vastly different walks of life, occupations and backgrounds, all of whom have found a happy new foothold in Africa. We learn what enterprises they are involved with in Africa, hear what they love about their new homes, but also what challenges they've had to overcome while settling on a new continent.::Sabido
